metadata.title: CVE-2019-5847 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - untriaged
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in JavaScript in Google Chrome prior to75.0.3770.142 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heapcorruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
